scheduler.menu.file
Class FileOpen

java.lang.Object
  scheduler.menu.file.FileOpen

public class FileOpen
extends java.lang.Object

Handles the opening of the Scheduler files.

Author:
Eric Liebowitz

Constructor Summary
FileOpen(javax.swing.JFileChooser fc)
          Displays the "Open File" dialog and acts accordingly to restore Scheduler data from the selected file.

Constructor Detail

FileOpen

public FileOpen(javax.swing.JFileChooser fc)
Displays the "Open File" dialog and acts accordingly to restore Scheduler data from the selected file. Data is expected to be found in the following order:
  • The Schedule
  • The CDB
  • The IDB
  • The LDB
  • TODO: The PDB

Parameters:
fc - The FileChooser to be used for opening the file
Method Detail

readSchedule

private void readSchedule(java.io.ObjectInputStream ois)
Reads a "Schedule" object from a given object stream and changes the Scheduler's data to this reflex this new object.

Parameters:
ois - Object file stream to read the Schedule object from

readLocalCDB

private void readLocalCDB(java.io.ObjectInputStream ois)
Reads the local cdb from a given object stream and changes the Scheduler's data to reflect this.

Parameters:
ois - Object file stream to read the local cdb data from

readLocalIDB

private void readLocalIDB(java.io.ObjectInputStream ois)
Reads the local idb from a given object stream and changes the Scheduler's data to reflect this.

ois - Object file stream to read the local idb data from

readLocalPDB

private void readLocalPDB(java.io.ObjectInputStream ois)
Reads the local pdb from a given object stream and changes the Scheduler's data to reflect this. Currently, the following pieces of the PDB are read in (in this order): - DaysForClasses preferences

Parameters:
ois - Object file stream to read the local pdb data from
